about_the_game:
This DLC contains:

Development Art, Artworks, Sketches!

Discover 40 pages of pure high-resolution art and digital illustrations covering everything our artist have drawn and imagined for Koloro during all it's development.

19 unique wallpapers!

Personnalize your desktop with 19 unique wallpapers of Koloro available in 4 differents resolutions : 4k - 1920x1080 - 1920x1200 - 2560x1080

How to access the Digital Artbook and Wallpapers:

  • 1. Right click "Koloro" in the Steam Library
  • 2. Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
  • 3. Open the "Artbook and Wallpapers" folder

short_description: Between dreams and nightmares, “Koloro” tells the tale of a young pink hair girl named Kora who embarks on a quest to find her missing sister through a stunning Puzzle-Platformer crafted by Sköll Studio.
